CreatePdusCommand.title: Schema for the JsonConfig of the spirent.methodology.CreatePdusCommand.

enable.description: A flag indicating if the frameconfig should be changed in the streamblocks

pdus.description: Object that contains information about a single pdu

enable.description: A flag indicating if this PDU should be addeded into the streamblock

element_type.description: The type of the element, i.e. pdu, vlans, etc.

pdu.description: Indicates the type of pdu. Used when element_type = 'pdu'

pdu_data.description: Elements within the pdu. Can contain other pdus.

property_data.description: Contains the pdus properties and their values
